question_1.question: What is the first step to update an existing data source provider in TimeXtender according to the article?

options.option_b: Sign into the TimeXtender Portal and go to data sources
options.option_d: Uninstall the previous version of the provider

question_1.explanation: The first step is to sign into the TimeXtender Portal and navigate to data sources, as this is where you can see if updates are available.

question_2.question: Where will a newer version of a data source provider appear if it is available?

options.option_c: On the list in the data sources section of the TimeXtender Portal
options.option_d: It needs to be searched for manually in the portal

question_2.explanation: If a newer version of a data source provider is available, it will appear on the list in the data sources section of the TimeXtender Portal.

question_3.question: Who is the author of the article on updating data source providers in TimeXtender?
question_3.explanation: The article was authored by Christian Hauggaard, as indicated in the provided context.

question_4.question: What is the purpose of the article written by Christian Hauggaard?

options.option_a: To introduce new data source providers
options.option_b: To describe how to delete a data source provider
options.option_c: To describe how to update an existing data source provider to a newer version
options.option_d: To troubleshoot issues with data source providers

question_4.explanation: The article's purpose is to describe how to update an existing data source provider to a newer version.
